title: Remedial: How to Use a Knife Safely

steps.title: Step 1: Grip the Knife Correctly
steps.description: Hold the handle firmly with your dominant hand. Keep your index finger straight and along the top of the blade, away from the sharp edge. This provides better control.

steps.title: Step 2: Use a Claw Grip
steps.description: When holding the food, curl your fingertips under to form a 'claw'. Your knuckles should guide the side of the knife blade. This protects your fingertips from being cut.
